272889.「今回 キミに参加してもらうのは\n リハーサルだ。無論 ノーヒントで\n 探し:
This time, I'm asking you to participate in a
rehearsal. Of course, I don't expect you to
find it with no hints.

272890.「だから <pc>くんには\n とっておきのアシストを ふたつ 用意した。\n:
That's why <pc> has prepared two
special assistants. The first one is this.

272891.ネモフィラが 杖をふるうと\n<pc>の写真機が 震えだした！:
Nemophila waved her wand and <pc>'s
photo machine began to shake!

272892.「私は今 キミの写真機に 特別な\n キラキラの魔法を かけたのだ。……どうかね:
I have just cast a special glitter spell on
your photo machine. What do you think? Please
try to start up your photo machine.

272893.「うん。バッチリ うまくいっているようだ。\n このキラキラの魔法を通すことで:
It seems to be working perfectly. Through the
magic of the sparkle, it becomes easier to see
things that are usually difficult to see.

272894.「つまり この写真機を 通して見れば\n エッグも 見つけやすくなるということだ:
So, if you look through this photo machine, it
will be easier to find Egg.

272895.「リハーサルに 参加する際には\n この写真機の魔法を うまく活用して\n エッ:
When you attend the rehearsal, please take
advantage of the magic of this photo machine
and capture the eggs on your photo trues.

272896.『撮影設定』の 『フレーム設定』で\nキラキラの魔法を 使えるようになった！<s:
The magic of glitter can now be used in the
"Frame Settings" of the "Photo Settings"!<se_nots System 7>

272897.「そして これが ふたつめのアシストだ。\n <pc>くんの お供として\n コ:
And this is the second assist. I want you to
take this guy with you to accompany
<pc>.

272898.「やっほ～！\n 呼ばれて 飛びでた バニーエッグの\n バニたまちゃんなのバニ:
Hey there! Bunneggma the bunny egg jumped out
at the call!

272899.「あなたが <pc>ちゃんバニ？\n ボクに負けないくらい とっても\n キュー:
Are you <pc>Vani? You're as cute as
me! I'm as cute as I am!

272900.「えっ！？\n バニーエッグって なんなのバニって？\n 細か～いことは 気にし:
What? What's a bunny egg? I don't care about
the details~.

272901.「ボクは フェアリーエッグが どこにあろうと\n その場所を 見抜くことができる:
I'm an amazing creature who can tell where the
Fairy Egg is, no matter where it is.

272903.「まぁ…… なんだ。これも リハーサルのために\n 私が用意したものだ。キミには:
Well, what the heck. I've prepared this for
rehearsal, and I want you to listen to his
voice while you try to find the egg.

272904.「とにかく！ 先ほど 写真機にかけた魔法と\n お供のバニたまがいれば \n リ:
Anyway! With the magic I just cast on the
photo machine and my companion Bunneggma,
rehearsals should be no problem.

272905.「ボクは <pc>ちゃんと一緒に行くバニ。\n これから よろしくなのバニ～！\:
I'm going with <pc>. I'm looking
forward to working with you from now on
Bunny~! <pc>~.

272907.「では <pc>くんの準備ができたら\n さっそく だいじなものを つかって\n:
Now that you have <pc> ready, start
talking to Bunneggma using Key Items.

272908.「…………すごく 眠いバニ。\n ボクは もう…… 疲れた…バ…ニ……。: I'm so sleepy. I'm already tired.

272909.「やれやれ まったく……。\n やはり 最初に 私が止めるべきだったか。:
Oh dear, indeed. After all, I should have
stopped him first.

272910.「ああ すまん。\n わけがわからない！ といった顔だな。:
Oh, I'm sorry. I don't understand! I don't get
it!" is the look on your face.

272911.「……ふむ。そうだな。\n キミの写真機にかけた 魔法があるだろう？\n アレで:
Hmm. Yeah, that's right. You know that magic
you put on your photo machine? You should take
a look at Bunneggma.

272912.「どうやら 見えたようだな。\n ……言っただろう？ この魔法は 普段\n 見え:
Looks like you saw it. I told you, didn't I? I
told you that this magic makes things that are
normally difficult to see easier to see.

272913.「ん…… んん……。\n <pc>ちゃん…… バニ……？\n ハハ……バレちゃっ:
Hmmm. <pc> Bani? Haha I got exposed,
rather thank God Bani.

272914.「お願いバニ……。\n どうか あなたの手で\n このファスナーを おろしてほし:
Please, Bani. Please, I want you to unzip this
zipper with your hand!<yesno><close>

272915.「そんなこと言わずに お願いバニ～……。\n どうか あなたの手で\n このファ:
Don't say that, please, Bani~! Please, I want
you to unzip this zipper with your hand!<yesno><close>

272916.「ありがとう…… バニ～……。\n これで ボクも…… ようやく……:
Thank you, Vanni. Now I'll finally be able
to...

272918.「は～～～っ！ く… 苦しかった～～～！\n 着ぐるみで 動きまわるのって\n:
Ha~~! It was painful~~~! It takes a lot of
physical strength to spin around in a costume,
doesn't it?

272919.「あははっ！ それにしても <pc>ったら\n 最後まで 気がつかないなんて\n:
Haha! But still, <pc>, you were
totally fooled by my acting that you didn't
notice until the very end!

272920.「すまない <pc>くん。\n 私は ダマすつもりなど なかったのだが\n 黙っ:
Sorry <pc>. I didn't mean to trick
you, but Honey was nagging me to shut up.

272921.「ネモフィラが リハーサルをするっていうなら\n 私も何か手伝わなくちゃ！ って:
If Nemophila is going to rehearse, I have to
help out! I thought.

272922.「せっかくなら あなたを おどろかせちゃおって\n イタズラ心が ムクムクしてき:
I wanted to scare you, but my mischievous
heart was getting impatient!

272923.「でも 慣れない着ぐるみに 疲れてきたのに\n 自分で ファスナーを おろせなく:
But I was getting tired of being in a costume
I wasn't used to, and I couldn't unzip the
zipper by myself. Thanks to you, I was saved.

272924.「……ハァ。とはいえ キミとベラのおかげで\n リハーサルが無事 終わったのも:
Huh. However, thanks to you and Honey, the
rehearsal went well. The preparations for the
festival are now complete.

272925.「キミのおかげで いろいろと助かったよ。\n ……本当に ありがとう。:
You have helped me in so many ways. Thank you
so much.

272926.「ねえ ネモフィラ。\n フェアリーエッグは 妖精がそれぞれ 着色して\n 好き:
Hey Nemophila, I thought Fairy Eggs were
supposed to be colored by each fairy and
hidden wherever they wanted?

272928.「私 バニたまを やっていたから\n まだ 自分のものを 着色してなかったの。\:
I was doing Bunneggma, so I hadn't colored my
own yet. Hmmm, yeah.

272929.「決めたわ！ 私のエッグは お祭りの功労者……\n <pc>の真の姿を イメージ:
I've decided! I'll design my egg in the image of true , the festival contributor! Right now it's Slime's figure
though.

272931.「私の分として アストルティアのどこかに\n 隠しておくから <pc>も\n ぜ:
I'll hide it somewhere in Astoltia for my own
use, so I'd appreciate it if you could try to
find <pc> too!

272932.「ベラ…… ネモフィラ……\n 春のお祭りの準備が\n すべて ととのったのです:
Honey Nemophila I see that everything is ready
for the Spring Festival.

272933.「<pc>も この子たちに付き合って\n よくやってくれました。\n ベラのイタ:
<pc> has done well with these kids.
Honey's pranks have been a bit of a problem
for me.

272934.「これも この子なりに <pc>を\n 楽しませようと 思ってのこと。\n どう:
This is her way of trying to entertain
<pc>. Please forgive her.

272935.「そうなのよ！\n 私も <pc>と一緒に アストルティアを\n めぐるのは と:
Yes, I know! I had a great time exploring
Astoltia with <pc> too!

272936.「さあ ベラ……。\n 最後の仕事ですよ。\n 春風と共に お祭りの開始を告げる:
Come on, Honey, it's time for your final task.
With the spring breeze, we herald the start of
the festivities.
